name: Linksistent - How to & Templates
description:
Linksistent is a Chrome extension that provides a consolidated access point for up-to-date Figma design files or prototypes.


Use this file as a starting point while learning Linksistent naming convention or using one of four existing templates for a quick start.


------------


Step by step tutorial (by Tutorial Tim): Here


You can learn more about the Linksistent on this page.


If you have any suggestions for how to improve the Extension, or if you find an alternate use for it, let me know!
